alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 2:37AM CDT until July 11 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seminole County in east central Oklahoma... Eastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 237 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tecumseh, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Seminole, Tecumseh, Wewoka, Pink, Konawa, Maud, Earlsboro, Bowlegs, Tribbey, Johnson, St. Louis, Sasakwa, Brooksville, Macomb, Bethel Acres, Lima, Aydelotte, and Harjo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
